title: type used in Fone Zone hiptop slide ad
content:
it think it’s myriad, but i;m not sure, does anyone know what the font used for ’get mobile with’ is?

[http://www.fonezone.com.au/hiptop/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025043308/http:/www.fonezone.com.au/hiptop/ "http://www.fonezone.com.au/hiptop/")

thanks!

 [‹ Three Cups of Tea](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025043308/http:/typophile.com/node/50669 "Go to previous forum topic") [Beacon Theatre marquis Is this a font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025043308/http:/typophile.com/node/50671 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Simon Robertson

comments.content: ok, i’m 99% sure it’s Myriad Pro Light Condensed - [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/myriad/light-cond/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081025043308/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/myriad/light-cond/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/myriad/light-cond/")
